body:
I have wanted to become a Map Dev for a long time... (Life story) 

Anyway I was just thinking maybe if a Map Dev did like a time-lapse on making a map that would show how to generate different buildings in nebula conditions and stuff like mountains. Thanks if you do make the time lapse it would help me a lot.
